reviews.review_msg: yeah !!!!!!!he is great :))never take 120 with Jeff Sonier , take Bernd instead  and u wont regret :)))hismidterms are easy but final is a bit hrd but if u do every question from the book, u will be really fine . Quizzes are hard but those are worth 5 percent in total. Good job Bernd. I love phy now
